item.title: Cassie add a quote by Martha Beck
item.description: "Learning to let go of expectations is a ticket to peace. It allows us to ride over every crisis—small or large, brother-in-law or end-of-quarter office lockdown—like a beach ball on water. The next time a problem arises in your life, take a deep breath, let out a sigh, and replace the thought Oh no! with the thought Okay." -- Martha Beck

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Gary Zukav
item.description: "If you want to have the kind of relationship that your heart yearns for, you have to create it. You can't depend on somebody else creating it for you." -- Gary Zukav

item.title: Cassie add a quote by Robert Holden
item.description: "One of the big mistakes I think we make in relationships is that we don't give our best energy to the people that matter most." -- Robert Holden
